pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, November 28, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, November 28, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

8:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Ottawa

Note for media:

  • Closed to media
